_header: Of all thy friends She is the flower
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: A song in praise of the Virgin Mary — six quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Asay, asay’ and burden: ‘Man asay say say / Make thi mone to mary þat mild m[ay]’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Of all þi frendes sche is þe flowrsche wyll þe bryng
                    to þi honowr…
BodEngPoete1.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,
                        ed.  
             Songs and Carols from a manuscript…of the Fifteenth
                Century.
Percy Society
         23. London: Richards, 1847: 49-50.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 137; 1977, 121.
